project_descr: The project on Border Management & Border Community supports strategy development with a coordination and resource mobilisation service at regional level, to support Government plans and community-identified initiatives.

outputs.output_descr: Development and initial implementation of strategies to improve interaction of legitimate State border management authorities with local population (men and women) in Sahel Region of Burkina Faso

document_name: Acquisition de motos pour le compte de la Police des Frontières
